text: Bernard Tissier de Mallerais (; (14 September 1945 – 8 October 2024) was a French Catholic prelate. He was a bishop of the Society of Saint Pius X from 1988 until his death in 2024. Tissier de Mallerais was born in Sallanches, France. He was ordained a priest in 1975. On 28 September 2024, Tissier de Mallerais suffered a skull fracture and internal haemorrhage because of a fall he had in Écône, Switzerland. He was placed into a coma. Tissier de Mallerais died on 8 October 2024 at a hospital in Martigny, Switzerland at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls Category:Deaths from hemorrhage Category:French Roman Catholic bishops
